inclusion.criterion: pediatric patients with glucose intolerance per ADA criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: free of acute or chronic inflammatory processes 3 months prior to recruitment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous personal history of diabetes or demonstrating diabetes in OGTT curve
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: chronic renal disease or serum creatinine over 1.4 mg/dl (females) or 1.5 (males)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 34-year-old woman from Jordan with general and non-specific bones and joints pain. Her past medical history is unremarkable.
